doc.title: Captives of Conspiracy
doc.plot: Softcore bondage film with six vignettes. In the first story, cute blonde Noelle daydreams of being a damsel in distress while reading a book about men's adventure magazines. In the second story, Mackenzie tries to blackmail a crook, but is left bound and gagged by the criminal after she sips a drugged glass of wine. In the third interlude, Lynn and Gwen struggle side by side unable to slip their bonds. Jamie is surprised by Anita, a Hungarian beauty, stripped and left to struggle in her lingerie. The fifth story shows the unhappy fate of a store clerk who discovers her customer is a criminal and is left to struggle, roped and muzzled, while he makes his getaway. In the last tale, Shamrin and Victoria plot to steal the wealth of Victoria's two-timing husband, but the auburn-haired beauty is double-crossed and left to struggle hogtied on a hassock.
